name: Hacker News to Video Template - AlexK1919

parameters.toolDescription: grab the article for the ai agent to use

parameters.content:
# Choose your data source 
## This can be swapped for any other data source of your choosing.

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "alchemy": true,
  "width": 1024,
  "height": 768,
  "modelId": "6b645e3a-d64f-4341-a6d8-7a3690fbf042",
  "num_images": 1,
  "presetStyle": "MONOCHROME",
  "prompt": "{{ $json.body.promptGeneration.prompt }}; Use the rule of thirds, leading lines, & balance. DO NOT INCLUDE ANY WORDS OR LABELS.",
  "guidance_scale": 7,
  "highResolution": true,
  "promptMagic": false,
  "promptMagicStrength": 0.5,
  "promptMagicVersion": "v3",
  "public": false,
  "ultra": false,
  "photoReal": false,
  "negative_prompt": ""
}

parameters.text:
=Can you tell me if the article at {{ $json.url }} is related to automation or ai? 

then, create a 250 word summary of the article

Also, list any image url's related to the article content from the url. Limit to 1 image url.

options.systemMessage:
You are a helpful assistant in summarizing and identifying articles related to automation and ai. 
Output the results as:
summary: 
related: yes or no
image urls:

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "alchemy": true,
  "width": 1024,
  "height": 768,
  "modelId": "6b645e3a-d64f-4341-a6d8-7a3690fbf042",
  "num_images": 1,
  "presetStyle": "MONOCHROME",
  "prompt": "{{ $json.body.promptGeneration.prompt }}; Use the rule of thirds, leading lines, & balance. DO NOT INCLUDE ANY WORDS OR LABELS.",

You can extend this workflow further by posting the generated assets to social media.

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "max_width": 480,
  "template_id": "enterTemplateID",
  "modifications": {
    "Scenes.elements": [
      {
        "name": "Intro Comp",
        "type": "composition",
        "track": 1,
        "elements": [
          {
            "name": "Image-1",
            "type": "image",
            "source": "{{ $('Leo - Get imageId').item.json.body.generations_by_pk.generated_images[0].url }}"
          },
          {
            "name": "Subtitles-1",
            "type": "text",
            "transcript_source": "Voiceover-1",
            "width": "86.66%",
            "height": "37.71%",
            "x_alignment": "50%",
            "y_alignment": "50%",
            "fill_color": "#ffffff",
            "stroke_color": "#333333",
            "stroke_width": "1.05 vmin",
            "font_family": "Inter",
            "font_weight": "700",
            "font_size": "8 vmin",
            "background_color": "rgba(255,255,255,0.2)",
            "background_x_padding": "26%",
            "background_y_padding": "7%",
            "background_border_radius": "28%",
            "transcript_effect": "highlight",
            "transcript_color": "#ff5900"
          },
          {
            "name": "Voiceover-1",
            "type": "audio",
            "source": "{{ $('News1').item.json.property_name }}",
            "provider": "openai model=tts-1 voice=onyx"
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "name": "Auto Scene Comp",
        "type": "composition",
        "track": 1,
        "elements": [
          {
            "name": "Video-2",
            "type": "video",
            "source": "{{ $('Runway - Get Video').first().json.output[0] }}",
            "loop": true
          },
          {
            "name": "Subtitles-2",
            "type": "text",
            "transcript_source": "Voiceover-2",
            "y": "78.2173%",
            "width": "86.66%",
            "height": "37.71%",
            "x_alignment": "50%",
            "y_alignment": "50%",
            "fill_color": "#ffffff",
            "stroke_color": "#333333",
            "stroke_width": "1.05 vmin",
            "font_family": "Inter",
            "font_weight": "700",
            "font_size": "8 vmin",
            "background_color": "rgba(255,255,255,0.2)",
            "background_x_padding": "26%",
            "background_y_padding": "7%",
            "background_border_radius": "28%",
            "transcript_effect": "highlight",
            "transcript_color": "#ff5900"
          },
          {
            "name": "Voiceover-2",
            "type": "audio",
            "source": "{{ $('Article Prep').item.json.message.content['Summary Blurb 1'] }}",
            "provider": "openai model=tts-1 voice=onyx"
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "name": "Auto Scene Comp",
        "type": "composition",
        "track": 1,
        "elements": [
          {
            "name": "Video-3",
            "type": "video",
            "source": "{{ $('Runway - Get Video2').first().json.output[0] }}",
            "loop": true
          },
          {
            "name": "Subtitles-3",
            "type": "text",
            "transcript_source": "Voiceover-3",
            "y": "78.2173%",
            "width": "86.66%",
            "height": "37.71%",
            "x_alignment": "50%",
            "y_alignment": "50%",
            "fill_color": "#ffffff",
            "stroke_color": "#333333",
            "stroke_width": "1.05 vmin",
            "font_family": "Inter",
            "font_weight": "700",
            "font_size": "8 vmin",
            "background_color": "rgba(255,89,0,0.5)",
            "background_x_padding": "26%",
            "background_y_padding": "7%",
            "background_border_radius": "28%",
            "transcript_effect": "highlight",
            "transcript_color": "#ff0040"
          },
          {
            "name": "Voiceover-3",
            "type": "audio",
            "source": "{{ $('Article Prep').item.json.message.content['Summary Blurb 2'] }}",
            "provider": "openai model=tts-1 voice=onyx"
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}

parameters.content: # Article Analysis - Is it the right topic?
# Prepare the article for content generation

values.content:
=prepare the following summary for a newsletter where the article will be 1 of several presented in the newsletter:

{{ $('Article Analysis').first().json.output.summary }}

Make sure the Article Blurb lenght is less than 15 words.

Then, create 2 Summary Blurbs, making sure each is less than 15 words.

Also create 2 image prompts that is less than 15 words long for each Summary Blurb

Output in markdown format
Article Title
Article Blurb
Summary Blurb 1
Summary Blurb 2
Article Image
Image Prompt 1
Image Prompt 2

parameters.content: Don't forget to connect this last node to the loop to process additional items

parameters.content:
# Hacker News to Video Template - AlexK1919

## Overview
Automated workflow: Hacker News to Video Template - AlexK1919. This workflow integrates 22 different services: stickyNote, youTube, lmChatOpenAi, if, splitInBatches. It contains 82 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 82
- **Node Types**: 22
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When clicking ‘Test workflow’**: manualTrigger
- **Hacker News**: hackerNews
- **Loop Over Items**: splitInBatches
- **OpenAI Chat Model3**: lmChatOpenAi
- **HTTP Request1**: toolHttpRequest
- **Structured Output Parser**: outputParserStructured
- **Upload to Minio**: s3
- **News1**: set
- **Leo - Improve Prompt**: httpRequest
- **Leo - Get imageId**: httpRequest
- ... and 72 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible

description: Automated workflow: Hacker News to Video Template - AlexK1919. This workflow integrates 22 different services: stickyNote, youTube, lmChatOpenAi, if, splitInBatches. It contains 82 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.
